(a) After which garment worker do diminishing marginal returns begin for Malikah's Fashion Clothing? Explain using numbers.

(b) Assume Malikah's Fashion Clothing sells its clothes in a perfectly competitive market at a price of $8. Calculate the marginal revenue product of the fifth garment worker. Show your work.

(c) Malikah's Fashion Clothing hires garment workers in a perfectly competitive labor market for garment workers at a wage rate of $30 per hour, and the market price of clothes remains $8. How many garment workers will Malikah's Fashion Clothing hire to maximize its profit? Explain using marginal analysis.

(d) Assume the market price of clothes decreases as a result of a decrease in the number of consumers and Malikah’s Fashion Clothing continues to operate. What will happen to each of the following?(i) The marginal factor cost for Malikah’s Fashion Clothing. Explain.(ii) The marginal revenue product curve for Malikah’s Fashion Clothing. Explain.
